channel.title: VMUG Connect on Dale Hassinger
channel.description: Recent content in VMUG Connect on Dale Hassinger

item.title: VMUG Connect 2026 | Minneapolis
item.description:
VMUG Connect 2026:

VMUG Connect 2026 in Minneapolis is the first that I will be presenting outside of my local VMUG or VMware Explore. I am looking forward to the event to share my vCommunity story.

The Path to Influence: From VMUG Attendee to vExpert, Blogger, and Conference Speaker

Session Details: If you’ve ever felt the urge to present at a VMUG or start a technical blog but hesitated, this session is for you. At my first VMUG event, I was asking myself, “Can I do this?” My story is about setting a goal and finding fulfillment in the vCommunity by operating under one simple metric: If even a single person learns something new, the effort was worthwhile. Hear the personal story behind my decision to give back, the steps I took, and how you can start your own journey of presenting and contributing.

I’ll be using this blog as my official VMUG Connect Diary, so check back often. Big news: I’m adding a second presentation topic to my schedule! More updates #soon.

I hope my story gives you a glimpse into what makes the vCommunity so special. I look forward to contributing to the vCommunity for years to come. I encourage you to start your own journey today; the community is ready to welcome you.
